pkgmetadata.longdescription: Markov Chain Monte Carlo for Potts Models // Do Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation of Potts models (Potts, 1952, https://doi.org/10.1017/S0305004100027419), which are the multi-color generalization of Ising models (so, as as special case, also simulates Ising models). Use the Swendsen-Wang algorithm (Swendsen and Wang, 1987, https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevLett.58.86) so MCMC is fast. Do maximum composite likelihood estimation of parameters (Besag, 1975, https://doi.org/10.2307/2987782, Lindsay, 1988, https://doi.org/10.1090/conm/080).
